dialogue.response: Welcome to my city, traveler. What brings you to me?
Frederick mentioned that you summoned me.
I know who is behind all of this.

dialogue.text: This is the only city on this island. Life used to flourish here, but then these ugly creatures came.
dialogue.response: Do you know where they came from?

dialogue.text: Yes, yes! So you're the new one who's been making noise. I've got a task for you.
I have no idea. It happened suddenly. Since then, many people have been sitting at home and don't want to open the door to anyone.
dialogue.response: This is terrible. I'll try to help

dialogue.text: Kill 15 monsters and return for your reward.
It's good that I can count on you.
dialogue.response: I would like to ask something else.

dialogue.text: This is really great. Too bad there will be more soon... This is your reward.
dialogue.response: Is there anything else I can do for you?

dialogue.text: Yes... I received an encrypted letter, maybe you could read it?
Oh... Well, never mind, there's someone in town who can decipher things like that.
dialogue.response: Give me that letter and tell me where to go.

dialogue.text: Go to Ludwik, he lives nearby, be prepared to spend 500 gold coins.
dialogue.response: I got myself into quite a mess... Oh well. Thanks and goodbye.
He's a mage. I don't know his name.
Unfortunately no. I wanted to fight him, but he ran away from me.
He said I would not be able to stop this evil.

dialogue.text: So we still have to fight monsters... Thanks for everything. Bye.
